headers.subject: [tosdr:2920] Twitch [Bad] Broadcasters allow twitch to use content for anything.

subject: Twitch [Bad] Broadcasters allow twitch to use content for anything.
text:
Twitch Terms of Service - section for Broadcasters

This is in the section for broadcasters.

> By distributing or disseminating Broadcaster Content through the Twitch Service, you hereby grant to Twitch a worldwide, nonexclusive, royalty-free, perpetual, transferable and fully sublicensable right to use, host, convert for streaming, reproduce, modify, adapt, publish, translate, create derivative works from, distribute, perform, display and otherwise exploit your Broadcaster Content, in any form, format, media or media channels now known or hereafter developed or discovered. You grant Twitch and our sublicensees the right to use the name that you submit in connection with such content, if we or they choose.


Twitch may do anything with your Content.

-- 
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
